description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) has obtained and used tools like [Havij](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0224), [sqlmap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0225), Metasploit, [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), and Plink.(Citation: Check Point Rocket Kitten)(Citation: FireEye APT35 2018)(Citation: Check Point APT35 CharmPower January 2022)(Citation: DFIR Phosphorus November 2021)(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)
